metadata.title: CVE-2023-45232 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS. (noble) - medium
metadata.description:
EDK2's Network Package is susceptible to an infinite loop vulnerabilitywhen parsing unknown options in the Destination Options header of IPv6.This vulnerability can be exploited by an attacker to gain unauthorizedaccess and potentially lead to a loss of Availability.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2023-45232` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

efi-shell-aa64 - 2023.11-6
efi-shell-arm - 2023.11-6
efi-shell-ia32 - 2023.11-6
efi-shell-riscv64 - 2023.11-6
efi-shell-x64 - 2023.11-6
ovmf - 2023.11-6
ovmf-ia32 - 2023.11-6
qemu-efi-aarch64 - 2023.11-6
qemu-efi-arm - 2023.11-6
qemu-efi-riscv64 - 2023.11-6
No subscription required

criterions.comment: edk2 package in noble, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2023.11-6').
